Dead by Daylight é um jogo muito bom, impossível não ficar viciado no jogo, porque contém uma variedade de opções para jogar, além de poder convidar amigos.
Infelizmente contém alguns bugs de desconexão da partida, banimentos só por conta dá internet cair da partida, as vezes tem bug no carregamento, bug na própria partida... que fazem nós perder a paciência por uns instantes.
Mas quase sempre tem atts para a melhoria do jogo.

Начиная играть в эту игру в одиночку, вы должны понимать, что существует два варианта развития дальнейших событий, связанных с дбд: 
1) Вы наиграете несколько десятков часов, и более опытные игроки (относительно вас, 200-1000 часов, и именно в этом диапазоне встречается большее количество токсиков) напрочь отобьют у вас желание играть.
2) Либо вам повезёт и будут попадаться добрые игроки, либо вы просто не будете обращать внимание на токсиков, и тогда вы перейдёте на стадию задротства, и в этом случае избавиться от дбд будет, если не невозможно, то крайне сложно (она, безусловно будет вам раз за разом надоедать, но вы раз за разом, рано или поздно будете в неё возвращаться (неважно, через неделю или через год)). Тем не менее, я, наиграв 2.1к часов, всё же хочу попрощаться с этой игрой, поэтому и пишу эти строки. Однако, я более чем уверен, что я в неё ещё вернусь....

Après avoir passer 749 heures sur le jeu voilà ce que je pense :
- Un très bon gameplay avec que des parties différentes
- Très fun de jouer avec ses amis à ce jeu
- Le jeu parraît frustrant mais détrompez vous c'est à force de mourir qu'on apprend comment survivre 

Désavantages :
- C'est très long de trouver une partie les soirs pourtant il y a beaucoup de joueurs c'est un peu bizarre
- Une communauté vraiment rageuse et pleine de haine et de troller

What can I say about this game that hasn't have been said? 

Dead by Daylight is a game that has the power to suck you into a cruel world. It makes you scream, not from fear but frustration. True at times it can be horror-esk, however it lacks true horror game staples. Basically it's some good jump-scares here and there but no in depth terror. Until you've played the game long enough to grasp the basics. Then it becomes a nightmare. Being in a good chase will get your heart pumping and make you clench when you finally get struck down or feel god-like when you escape. 

However, Dead by daylight has some problems. 

The community can be kind at times, the game loves altruistic actions, but some people adopt cruel strategies to betray their fellow survivors. It also has some issues with certain features, being hit through pallets, being sucked back to windows, bad map design, useless ranking system, useless perks and overpowered perks. On the killer side, about 400 or so hours spent there, the game can be enjoyable at times and infuriating at others but i enjoyed my time as a killer. I won't speak of the dev's. I'll just direct you to the sub-reddit. 

I love this game, I honestly do. The community while cruel, doesn't stop me from having a good time. I've recommended this game to many of my friends and have meet more constantly. Play a few hours and see how you like it, worth the price.

The low play time complaints are just mad at a difficult game they haven't gotten good at yet. The people who leave negative reviews either fall into the category of new players that have not gotten down the perks/ being able to escape killers; which is okay, it takes a very long time to get down. The more survivors you get, the more perks you'll have access to which will also open up a ton of possibilities. They go on sale for just a couple dollars all the time, and most you can get with the free in-game currency. The game is a lot of fun, and is based off of all four survivors working together. Between items, perks, and running ability, its 100% possible of escaping. Don't base your enjoyment of the game solely on surviving or you will hate the game. Get your points, have your fun, learn to trick killers and help people, and maybe even get some finny cheeky saves. Surviving is just a bonus and isn't necessary. Once you learn the perks and how the killers work more you will love the game.  Plus recently there was a visual bug, that is fixed, that made killers seem to be further away than they actually were so it seemed like you could never get away.
